alert.note: Alert for Okanogan Highlands; Okanogan Valley (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 11:15PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Ferry and east central Okanogan Counties through 1145 PM PDT... At 1115 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles northeast of Nespelem Community, or 31 miles east of Omak, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nespelem Community. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
